prompt: Design a sleek dark-themed bottom navigation with Home, Search, Favorites, and Profile tabs. Feature bold 'Welcome Back!' header (Roboto, 30pt, white) and 'Explore new content' subtitle (16pt, light gray). Include 2x2 grid of rounded feature cards (12dp) with centered icons (40dp), titles (14pt bold), and descriptions (10pt). Use dark background (#121212), amber accents (#FFB300) for active states, dark gray navigation (#1E1E1E) with gradient depth, subtle shadows (6px blur), and smooth fade transitions between outlined/filled icons (28dp).
